ygData.subject: Re: EQ Report
ygData.msgSnippet: I just about pooped my drawers thinking of the future of EQ -- holographic projection and full voice?! Cripes, I d never leave the holo chair, or whatever
ygData.messageBody:
I just about pooped my drawers thinking of the
future of EQ -- holographic projection and full voice?!
Cripes, I'd never leave the holo chair, or whatever you'd
use to do that. <br><br>They'd have to outlaw the
game, I think. It's (almost) too addictive as it
is.<br><br>If you want to read an interesting sociological
study (in progress) on EQ, go to . . . Argh, can't
remember the exact URL right now, but you'll see a
reference to it on the front page of www.everlore.com. I
think the author's name is Yee, so a +Yee +Everquest
search here on Yahoo! also might find
it.<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>10th season Rogue<br>Drinal
